title: Young Women Need to Hear This
author: VD
content_html:
The single most important thing a young woman can do is get married and have children. There is no career, no occupation, and no vocation that can even begin to compete with the importance of bearing the next generation.

And even the epitome of the career woman belatedly admits it.

DISCUSS ON SG
